La version 4.3.0 de Dodock est basée sur la version 15 de Frappe.
Une grande partie des changements cités ci-dessous ont été développés par l'équipe de Frappe Technologies et les contributeurs aux logiciels de l'éco-système Frappe/ERPNext.
Le détail des changements publiés dans Dodock est disponible sur
(Catalog): Add docname if there is a title field
Add a default search filter to Catalog
Extend perm debugging to popular controllers
(UX): Show status indicator in moblie view
(mobile-ui): Tabs should scroll instead of stack
Convert status field data to String before guessing the style
(minor): Increase rate limit for web form
Strip html instead of escaping when creating/updating workspace
Select field should not have debounce
Print perm check logs from DB query
Set correct recipient when reply to own email
Pass parent doctype on dashboard chart
(restore): Check backup directory and bench directory if we can't find the file
Added validation if upload is clicked without uploading file
Added invalid conditions for number fields
Count correction when a tag is deleted
Bom creator tree view not working
Set ignore_permissions on get_receiver_list in notification.py
Allowed standard fields in data export ( creation, owner)
Handle empty value of datetime control
Delete existing children first to avoid
Unpublish article when category is unpublished #15361
Show footer on login via Website Settings, fixes #24153
Ignore user settings on report doc
(minor): Don't load user_info for Administrator twice. fixes #22211
Added precision field in webform field
Mobile issue with form pop up
Set pipefail in shell before running piped backup/restore commands
